segment.source: Manage app orders in Windows Store for Business (Windows 10)
segment.target: Manage app orders in Windows Store for Business (Windows 10)

segment.source: You can view your order history with Windows Store for Business.
segment.target: You can view your order history with Windows Store for Business.

segment.source: Manage app orders in Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Manage app orders in Windows Store for Business

segment.source: After you've acquired apps, you can review order information and invoices on Order history.
segment.target: After you've acquired apps, you can review order information and invoices on Order history.

segment.source: On this page, you can buy more license for an app, view invoices, and request refunds.
segment.target: On this page, you can buy more license for an app, view invoices, and request refunds.

segment.source: Order history lists orders in chronological order and shows:
segment.target: Order history lists orders in chronological order and shows:

segment.source: Date ordered
segment.target: Date ordered

segment.source: Product name
segment.target: Product name

segment.source: Product publisher
segment.target: Product publisher

segment.source: Total cost
segment.target: Total cost

segment.source: Order status.
segment.target: Order status.

segment.source: Click to expand an order, and the following info is available:
segment.target: Click to expand an order, and the following info is available:

segment.source: Who purchased the app
segment.target: Who purchased the app

segment.source: Order number
segment.target: Order number

segment.source: Quantity purchased
segment.target: Quantity purchased

segment.source: Cost breakdown
segment.target: Cost breakdown

segment.source: Links to view your invoice, buy more, or request a refund
segment.target: Links to view your invoice, buy more, or request a refund

segment.source: Invoices
segment.target: Invoices

segment.source: Invoices for orders are available approximatley 24 hours after your purchase.
segment.target: Invoices for orders are available approximatley 24 hours after your purchase.

segment.source: The link opens a .pdf that you can save for your records.
segment.target: The link opens a .pdf that you can save for your records.

segment.source: Buy more licenses
segment.target: Buy more licenses

segment.source: You can purchase more copies of apps that are in your order history.
segment.target: You can purchase more copies of apps that are in your order history.

segment.source: To buy more licenses
segment.target: To buy more licenses

segment.source: Sign in to the Store for Business.
segment.target: Sign in to the Store for Business.

segment.source: Click Manage, and then choose Order history.
segment.target: Click Manage, and then choose Order history.

segment.source: Click an order, and then click Buy more.
segment.target: Click an order, and then click Buy more.

segment.source: You can buy more copies of the app from the product page.
segment.target: You can buy more copies of the app from the product page.

segment.source: Refund an order
segment.target: Refund an order

segment.source: Refunds work a little differently for free apps, and apps that have a price.
segment.target: Refunds work a little differently for free apps, and apps that have a price.

segment.source: In both cases, you must reclaim licenses before requesting a refund.
segment.target: In both cases, you must reclaim licenses before requesting a refund.

segment.source: Refunds for free apps
segment.target: Refunds for free apps

segment.source: For free apps, there isn't really a refund to request -- you're removing the app from your inventory.
segment.target: For free apps, there isn't really a refund to request -- you're removing the app from your inventory.

segment.source: You must first reclaim any assigned licenses, and then you can remove the app from your organization's inventory.
segment.target: You must first reclaim any assigned licenses, and then you can remove the app from your organization's inventory.

segment.source: Refunds for apps that have a price
segment.target: Refunds for apps that have a price

segment.source: There are a few requirements for apps that have a price:
segment.target: There are a few requirements for apps that have a price:

segment.source: Timing - Refunds are available for the first 30 days after you place your order.
segment.target: Timing - Refunds are available for the first 30 days after you place your order.

segment.source: For example, if your order is placed on June 1, you can self-refund through June 30.
segment.target: For example, if your order is placed on June 1, you can self-refund through June 30.

segment.source: Avaialble licenses - You need to have enough available licenses to cover the number of licenses in the order you are refunding.
segment.target: Avaialble licenses - You need to have enough available licenses to cover the number of licenses in the order you are refunding.

segment.source: For example, if you purchased 10 copies of an app and you want to request a refund, you must have at least 10 licenses of the app available in your inventory -- those 10 licenses can't be assigned to people in your organization.
segment.target: For example, if you purchased 10 copies of an app and you want to request a refund, you must have at least 10 licenses of the app available in your inventory -- those 10 licenses can't be assigned to people in your organization.

segment.source: Whole order refunds only - You must refund the complete amount of apps in an order.
segment.target: Whole order refunds only - You must refund the complete amount of apps in an order.

segment.source: You can't refund a part of an order.
segment.target: You can't refund a part of an order.

segment.source: For example, if you purchased 10 copies of an app, but later found you only needed 5 copies, you'll need to request a refund for the 10 apps, and then make a separate order for 5 apps.
segment.target: For example, if you purchased 10 copies of an app, but later found you only needed 5 copies, you'll need to request a refund for the 10 apps, and then make a separate order for 5 apps.

segment.source: If you have had multiple orders of the same app, you can refund one order but still keep the rest of the inventory.
segment.target: If you have had multiple orders of the same app, you can refund one order but still keep the rest of the inventory.

segment.source: To refund an order
segment.target: To refund an order

segment.source: Reclaim licenses, and then request a refund.
segment.target: Reclaim licenses, and then request a refund.

segment.source: If you haven't assigned licenses, start on step 5.
segment.target: If you haven't assigned licenses, start on step 5.

segment.source: Sign in to the Store for Business.
segment.target: Sign in to the Store for Business.

segment.source: Click Manage, and then choose Inventory.
segment.target: Click Manage, and then choose Inventory.

segment.source: Find the app you want to refund, click the ellipses under Action, and then choose View license details.
segment.target: Find the app you want to refund, click the ellipses under Action, and then choose View license details.

segment.source: Select the number of licenses you need to reclaim, and then click Reclaim licenses.
segment.target: Select the number of licenses you need to reclaim, and then click Reclaim licenses.

segment.source: Click Manage, and then choose Order history.
segment.target: Click Manage, and then choose Order history.

segment.source: Click the order you want to refund, and click Refund order.
segment.target: Click the order you want to refund, and click Refund order.

segment.source: For free apps, the app will be removed from your inventory.
segment.target: For free apps, the app will be removed from your inventory.

segment.source: For apps with a price, your payment option will be refunded with the cost of the app, and the app will be removed from your inventory.
segment.target: For apps with a price, your payment option will be refunded with the cost of the app, and the app will be removed from your inventory.
